title: Elementary Students' Attention Patterns Analysis and Effective Teaching Method Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and understanding of instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Learners are students and job seekers interested in language education, focusing on developing data collection and analysis competencies through actual classroom observations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze elementary students' attention patterns over time.
Learners can explain differences in attention concentration based on variables such as gender, grade level, and instructional format.
Learners can propose effective instructional design plans based on observational data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
